original_text: And it came to pass, when David was come to Mahanaim, that Shobi the son of Nahash of Rabbah of the children of Ammon, and Machir the son of Ammiel of Lodebar, and Barzillai the Gileadite of Rogelim,
korean_text: 다윗이 마하나임에 이르렀을 때에 암몬 족속에게 속한 랍바 사람 나하스의 아들 소비와 로데발 사람 암미엘의 아들 마길과 로글림 길르앗 사람 바르실래가

sentences.original_text: when David was come to Mahanaim
that Shobi the son of Nahash of Rabbah
and Machir the son of Ammiel of Lodebar
and Barzillai the Gileadite of Rogelim
